bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
libvirtd fails to initialize ncftool fails to initialize
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
0.2.8-6 for netcf linux kernel 4.11
How reproducible:
every time for me:
libvirtd[1362]: 2017-05-13 01:00:29.851+0000: 1425: error : netcfStateInitialize:94 : internal error: failed to initialize netcf libvirtd[1362]: 2017-05-13 01:00:29.852+0000: 1425: error : virStateInitialize:775 : Initialization of netcf state driver failed: internal error: f libvirtd[1362]: 2017-05-13 01:00:29.852+0000: 1425: error : daemonRunStateInit:884 : Driver state initialization failed
[root]/home/sdegler# ncftool Failed to initialize netcf
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Boot linux kernel, observe that libvirtd fails to start 2. Run ncftool and see it fail to initialize. 3. Revert to kernel 4.10 seems to fix.
Actual results:
libvirt fails to initialize for me. ncftool fails to initialize for me.
Expected results:
libvirtd running on system. ncftool running on system.
Additional info:
I did observe that 4.11 renames my ethernet devices. I did update the ifcfg-* files and networking does start up.

output with NLDBG=2 DBG<2> lib/cache.c:212 nl_cache_alloc: Allocated cache 0x55c205abe2c0 <route/link>. DBG<2> lib/cache.c:370 nl_cache_clear: Clearing cache 0x55c205abe2c0 <route/link>... DBG<2> lib/cache.c:654 nl_cache_request_full_dump: Requesting update from kernel for cache 0x55c205abe2c0 <route/link> DBG<2> lib/msg.c:283 __nlmsg_alloc: msg 0x55c205ac1de0: Allocated new message, maxlen=4096 DBG<2> lib/msg.c:357 nlmsg_alloc_simple: msg 0x55c205ac1de0: Allocated new simple message DBG<2> lib/msg.c:429 nlmsg_reserve: msg 0x55c205ac1de0: Reserved 16 (16) bytes, pad=4, nlmsg_len=32 DBG<2> lib/msg.c:455 nlmsg_append: msg 0x55c205ac1de0: Appended 16 bytes with padding 4 DBG<2> lib/attr.c:481 nla_reserve: msg 0x55c205ac1de0: attr <0x55c205ac21f0> 29: Reserved 8 (4) bytes at offset +16 nlmsg_len=40 DBG<2> lib/attr.c:516 nla_put: msg 0x55c205ac1de0: attr <0x55c205ac21f0> 29: Wrote 4 bytes at offset +16 DBG<2> lib/msg.c:576 nlmsg_free: msg 0x55c205ac1de0: Freed DBG<2> lib/cache.c:1061 nl_cache_refill: Updating cache 0x55c205abe2c0 <route/link> for family 0, request sent, waiting for reply DBG<2> lib/cache.c:695 __cache_pickup: Picking up answer for cache 0x55c205abe2c0 <route/link> DBG<2> lib/msg.c:283 __nlmsg_alloc: msg 0x55c205ac1de0: Allocated new message, maxlen=1248 DBG<2> lib/msg.c:576 nlmsg_free: msg 0x55c205ac1de0: Freed DBG<2> lib/msg.c:283 __nlmsg_alloc: msg 0x55c205ac1de0: Allocated new message, maxlen=5064 DBG<2> lib/msg.c:576 nlmsg_free: msg 0x55c205ac1de0: Freed DBG<2> lib/cache.c:706 __cache_pickup: While picking up for 0x55c205abe2c0 <route/link>, recvmsgs() returned -7: Invalid input data or parameter DBG<2> lib/cache.c:370 nl_cache_clear: Clearing cache 0x55c205abe2c0 <route/link>... DBG<2> lib/cache.c:572 nl_cache_remove: Deleted object 0x55c205ac27b0 from cache 0x55c205abe2c0 <route/link>. DBG<2> lib/cache.c:383 __nl_cache_free: Freeing cache 0x55c205abe2c0 <route/link>... Failed to initialize netcf
